page.title: 18A LOCAL TEACHER
page.content: I am an assistant teacher at the Humberston Infants School. I am married with two children. My husband is a telephone engineer. I teach a class of twenty-one children; boys and girls of five years old,in all subjects. I travel to school in my car bringing with me my daughter,aged twelve and my son aged eleven. They each then walk to their own schools. I go home at lunch-time and have time for some local shopping or some house- work. After school I occupy myself with jobs in school whilst I wait for my children,one of whom is usually involved in an after-school activity. We arrive home at five o'clock and I cook a dinner for us all.
